param.title: Roll/Pitch Rate Control:
param.desc: How much thrust is applied to rotate the copter at the desired speed.
param.name: RATE_RLL_P

param.title: Roll/Pitch Rate Dampening:
param.desc: How much dampening applies to the rate controller
param.name: RATE_RLL_D

param.title: Yaw Angular Rate Control:
param.desc: How much thrust is applied to rotate the copter at the desired speed.
param.name: RATE_YAW_P

param.title: Throttle Accel:
param.desc: How much thrust to give us the desired Accel. This will change depending on the weight and thrust of your copter.
param.name: THR_ACCEL_P

param.title: Throttle Hover:
param.desc: How much throttle is needed to maintain a steady hover.
param.name: THR_MID
